description: Volt is designed for young racers and ski enthusiasts who prioritize value and benefit most from low swing weight. The shafts are 100% carbon fiber to ensure great strength and a high stiffness to weight ratio. Rundle's quick change baskets come installed for maximum convenience, and the handles are constructed with real cork. Volt is an instant winner for parents buying performance poles for their young athletes and ski enthusiasts buying their first pair of high quality poles.
name: Volt Ski Pole Kit
